snippet: The appeal of a man convicted in the murder of a deputy sheriff hinges on whether there is a constitutional right to adequate appellate lawyers.
lead_paragraph: The appeal of a man convicted in the murder of a deputy sheriff hinges on whether there is a constitutional right to adequate appellate lawyers.

headline.seo: Texas Death Row Appeal Is More Than a Matter of Innocence
headline.main: Appeal of Death Row Case Is More Than a Matter of Guilt or Innocence
headline.print_headline: Appeal of Death Row Case Is More Than a Matter of Guilt or Innocence
